```{r}
if(!require("EBImage")){
  install.packages("EBImage")
}

if(!require("gtools")){
  install.packages("gtools")
}
library("EBImage")
library("gtools")
setwd("~/GitHub/project-2-predictive-modelling-group-3/data/pets/train")

images<-list.files("~/GitHub/project-2-predictive-modelling-group-3/data/pets/train") #directory pointed to a new set of unaltered cats and dogs
  
images<-mixedsort(images)


for (i in 1:length(images)){
  
img<-readImage(images[i])
rand.mod<-sample(1:2,1)  
 
  rand.value.a<-runif(1,min=-0.5,max=0.6) #brightness can't go too high
  rand.value.b<-runif(1,min=0.4,max=1.6)
  
  
  ifelse(rand.mod==1,img<-img+rand.value.a,img<-img*rand.value.b)  

  
  
  
rand.rotate<-sample(1:4,1)
ifelse(rand.rotate==1,img<-translate(rotate(img, 180), c(50, 0)), img<-img)
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
mypath<-file.path("~","GitHub","project-2-predictive-modelling-group-3","data","pets","train",paste("pet",i+2000,".jpg",sep=""))

     jpeg(file = mypath)
     
     plot(img)
     dev.off()
}

```
